CoMM

Source: R/rl_skat.R
rl_skat.Rd

fit SKAT using RL-SKAT: An Exact and Efficient Score Test for Heritability and Set Tests.

rl_skat(Z, y, X = NULL, intercept = T, method = NULL)

Arguments

Z

a standardized genotype matrix for GWAS data.
y

a vector for the phenotype of GWAS.
Z

a matrix of coveriates.

Value

List of model parameters: test statistics (scores) and p-value (pval)
